attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i want to stop family members being deported from the uk. it is not fair on the people involved and how much it acctually affects our lives. iam a britsh citizen and my partner is nigerian and has been sent back to nigeria as he wasnt legally living here, despite that he has to leave me and a child behind?? that is cruel and unfair and it has been devestating its not something i can explain in words but imagine how you would feel if one of your family memebers were taken away from you witout any assurance that you will ever be reunited??? why should i not be given the chance to have my say as iam a britsh citizen and iam being punished this is really not fair and i want to take it futher.
